issue.title: [C++] Add S3 support to fs::FileSystemFromUri
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7761](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7761). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
FileSystemFromUri doesn't support S3. This would give almost immediate support for S3 in python/R.
